DOC.criteria: Healthy freeliving men age 20 60 year old , postmenopausal woman age 45 60 year old , day inclusion Able understand information sheet comply trial procedure Having give write consent take part study prior participation . Body mass index ( BMI ) : 18.0 35 kg/m² . Those diagnosed Phenylketonuria ( PKU ) Those know suspect food intolerance , allergy hypersensitivity Women know pregnant intend become pregnant course study Women breast feeding Participation another clinical trial Those donate blood within 3 month screen visit participant participation study would result donated 1500 millilitre blood previous 12 month Those Full Blood Counts Liver Function test result outside normal range Premenopausal woman due potential influence cyclical change reproductive hormone insulin sensitivity Current smoker , report give smoking within last 6 month History substance abuse alcoholism Reported history CVD , diabetes ( fast glucose ≥ 7.1 mmol/L ) , cancer , kidney , liver bowel disease , gastrointestinal disorder use drug likely alter gastrointestinal function Unwilling restrict consumption specify high polyphenol food 24 h study Weight loss > 3kg precede 2 month body mass index < 18 > 35 kg/m² Blood pressure ≥160/100 mmHg Total cholesterol ≥ 7.5 mmol/L ; fast triacylglycerol concentration ≥ 5.0 mmol/L Medications may interfere study alphaglucosidase inhibitor ( e.g . acarbose ) , insulinsensitising drug ( e.g . metformin , thiazolidinediones ) , sulfonylureas , lipidlowering drug . Other medication , review medical representative KCL case case basis . Nutritional supplement may interfere study high dose vitamins/minerals ( > 200 % RNI ) , B vitamins , Vitamin C , calcium , copper , chromium , iodine , iron , magnesium , manganese , phosphorus , potassium zinc .
